snippet: An emerging campaign theme is a way not only to appeal to the middle class but also to convey that when it comes to political combat, Hillary Rodham Clinton is not President Obama..
abstract: Emerging theme of Hillary Rodham Clinton's presidential campaign is that she is a fighter; tactic aligns her with middle class values but also sets her apart from Pres Obama, perceived by many to have a leadership style lacking in forcefulness.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and PATRICK HEALY

lead_paragraph: An emerging campaign theme is a way not only to appeal to the middle class but also to convey that when it comes to political combat, Hillary Rodham Clinton is not President Obama..

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Vows to ‘Fight’ Evoke a Populist Appeal and a Contrast With Obama
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Vows to ‘Fight’ Evoke a Populist Appeal and a Contrast With Obama
